metadata.title: CVE-2016-2504 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Qualcomm GPU driver in Android before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 5, 5X, 6, 6P,and 7 (2013) devices allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka Android internal bug 28026365 and Qualcomm internal bugCR1002974.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
